website_summaries.verdict: Effective cavitation machine that offers EMS and infrared functions that can help reduce fat and tighten the skin.
pros: Sonic waves penetrate the skin to break up fat stored in the stomach, arms, and legs
Tightens skin for a smoother appearance
Doesn’t get hot, so treatments are pain-free and irritation-free
cons: Some buyers complain that the machine doesn’t come with instructions

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It truly works.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this slimming machine for about a month now, and I have to say I am so happy with it. It is so easy to use and I have seen great results with it. I highly recomend it, as it truly does work. I use it along with an anti celluite oil and it feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Chaidez

customer_reviews.title: Fat Melting at Home
customer_reviews.text: This fancy machine looks like a shower head but comes with a little manual on how to use each option of the device for the mode of fat melting you desire. Unlike most devices, this one actually has a little bit longer cord for easier use. I do not know how long it will take to achieve the best results but why stop now. Great product, packaging and information.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: As pictured, does not heat up at all. So don’t expect it to get hot.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if it’s a good value for the money, time will tell. Does not light up all around, only 4 red dots on each circle corner. Don’t expect it to light up all around, no blue no white light. Arrived on time and as in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was going to return it but after reading how to use it. It got rid of my double chin and sagging jaw line.save me a ton of money getting a facelift
customer_reviews.author: msessence62

customer_reviews.title: Only used it 3 times so far.
customer_reviews.text: Will do a review in a month to let you know if it really works or not.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: It does work but probably not powerful enough to create any effects.
customer_reviews.author: Real Person 87

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Figuring out how to use this was easier than I expected! I used to for the first time yesterday so I can’t speak for the results quite yet, but I will update this once I have been using it for a couple weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Yost

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: It has made a difference in my skin already and it's growing again and I already feel my skin tighting, I have already lost some weight. I am so ecstatic that I happy found this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Mora

customer_reviews.title: Machine is very good
customer_reviews.text: I used it liked instructed, I could feel some heat and it seemed like some of my stretch Mark's were disappearing.It’s amazing! I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Addison Coulter

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Started with my arms and under chin noticed a change after about 10 days. Happy with results.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it every day for the past week and this is really effective at burning fat.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Luedeman

customer_reviews.title: A good ritual to do!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product. Using the red on high and I am seeing some results on my neck as for my stomach a little bit I just have to cut down on snacks, lol. I cannot believe I dropped mine on my tile floor and it broke!!!!! I’m using coconut oil and I guess I didn’t clean it well enough so it dropped, oops!!! Showing picture as you have to be careful. Don’t let this happen to you. I will be ordering a new one because I really liked having this ritual.
customer_reviews.author: larimar girl

customer_reviews.title: Broke After One Use
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to add this as part of my exercise program. I used it once, then started my monthly- and according to the instructions you can't use it when you are on your period. I set it aside, then went to use it last night and it doesn't work. The ultrasonic isn't working and it doesn't heat up. The handle got extremely hot. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Thigh gap popping
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is YES! I was doing ginger wraps to control my thigh fat but now that’s canceled. Two weeks of treatment on my inner thighs with this tool and I’m in awe. Next up: arm fat. My body will be perfect in a couple of months!!!! If this breaks I’ll happily purchase another. It works ladies.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

product_meta.title: Body Sliming Machine EMS Fat Remove Machine Infared Weight Loss Skin Care Device for Women Men Use on Belly Stomach Arm Facial Abdominal Legs at Home
feature_bullets: 3 in 1 Fat Burner Machine: including Sonic + EMS + Infrared can offer you shaping and facial care. Sonic vibration can be used for skin tightening. Also can be used for shaping a charming body line.
Sonic function vibration of 1,000,000 times/s. Can directly reach the bottom skin, burn energy effectively, so to achieving the effect of weight loss. Works well on stomach, abdomen, arms and legs.

EMS fat machine with 5 modes:Tapping, Massage, Knead, Scrapping, Sliming. 5 level intensity for your choice. Can make muscle movement, help to relieve fatigue and keep the skin tightening and weight loss.

Infrared can restore the elasticity. Promote nutrient absorption, make the skin more compact. Can remove harmful substances in the skin, achieve the effect of massaging and relaxing, improve skin aging.
Please note that: This fat loss massager CAN NOT heat up or vabration, but it can work properely. Apply cream, oil or gel when use, you get better result for firming thighs, arms, waist and hips.
